title: Ophthalmic Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Avera Health in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: They asked standard interview questions (some ethical situations). First interview is with 2 people over Zoom and is very short in length. They ended up hiring internally for the position.
Interview Questions: Know Avera’s mission and how it relates to you

title: Specialist Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was good. The interview process was just like other interviews. The interview process was not rigorous. The interview process was answering questions. The interview process was over the phone.

title: Senior Application Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Avera Health
Interview Descriptions: Overall, the interview process went well. Pretty simple and easy. Applied through the website. Process took 2 months may be. Total three rounds of interview. First round of the interview with the Talent consultant. Then next round with the Manager and then with the Director.
Interview Questions: Explain about previous projects work experience

title: Finance/Accounting Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at Avera Health (Sioux Falls, SD)
Interview Descriptions:
Initial phone interview from HR was a screening interview mostly to determine qualifications.  Then given job description that was very different than original ad.

Second phone interview with  manager who didn't really didn't have the same background in this job.  Seemed to be more worried about office culture than job qualifications.  Very disappointing interview.

title: Marketing Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Avera Health in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was very professional and thorough. I spoke with all the key people I would be working with if chosen for the job. They were respectful and seemed genuinely interested in what I shared with them.
Interview Questions: They asked that I present a portfolio of some of my work.

title: Project Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Avera Health (Sioux Falls, SD) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was what one would expect anywhere.  As with a larger corporation, the overall process was slow.  Individuals involved were extremely friendly.  There was a lot of waiting and anticipating for an over.  If you listen closely, you have a pretty good indication of next steps and if you should be expecting an offer.
Interview Questions: How do you handle difficult persons?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Avera Health
Interview Descriptions: 1 on 1 with simple questions, previously was a student at hospital.  Questions were basic scene rio healthcare questions asked at initial job interviews.  They contacted me next day with hiring info.

title: Director of Sales and Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Avera Health (Sioux Falls, SD) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: They were all behavior based questions. Three interviews. Months apart. Phone interview followed by a single person then two group. Process was spread out over three months and no real rush to hire.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you had to work with a coworker who wasn’t pulling their weight or was difficult to work with and what you did.

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Avera Health (Sioux Falls, SD) in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions: I had initially visited a staffing agency seeking temp assignment.  I was interviewed by the staffing agency and we discussed my interests and experience.  An interview was scheduled with Avera and was offered the temp position.  After working for 3 months an offer of permanent full time employment was made and I accepted this offer.
Interview Questions: why are you the best candidate for this position?

title: Patient Care Partner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Avera Health (Sioux Falls, SD) in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: Fairly easy interview. They made me feel very relaxed and welcome. I applied and in a week I got a phone call about setting up a time to meet. I met with them a week later and a couple days later they called and told me I got the job.
Interview Questions: What is the best and worst thing about your current job?

title: Office Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Avera Health (Aberdeen, SD) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Three interviews.  All short and to the point.  Each interview was on a separate day.  Punctual. Interviewers were polite.  Did get a quick reply after third interview.
Interview Questions: What is your impression of Avera?

title: RN-operation Room Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Avera Health (Aberdeen, SD) in Aug 2009
Interview Descriptions: OR nursing manager and two other co-workers interviewed me. started with a paper test question and then are 11 questions. (Behavior ) and the last question is  to talk about your previous job.
Interview Questions: how to handle a difficult client and give examples
